products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Lime Electric Roller Blind
products.description: A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades. This bold green roller blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom or kitchen as it is moisture resistant and will add a splash of colour. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for difficult to reach windows.
